features: ✅ 【60PCS Gold Silverware Set,Service For 12】The 60pcs gold stainless steel flatware set comes with 12 each dinner forks, dinner spoons, dinner knives, teaspoons and salad forks, healthy in use and well designed styles, satisfy your daily demands. This 60pcs complete flatware set deal for everyday use, party, entertaining, camping, restaurant, hotel.

✅ 【18/0 Stainless Steel & Dishwasher Safe】Made of decent quality 18/0 stainless steel, good corrosion resistance, BPA free,no metallic aftertaste,rust-proof, sturdy enough for service a long time. Solid color is coated under high pressure to ensure our silverware sets can withstand the high temperatures of the dishwasher without losing luster of surface. Healthy and sturdy for daily use, dishwasher Safe.

✅【Mirror Polished & Proper Weight】Elegant gold flatware set with a finely polished satin finish, simple and neat design. Highly polished and smooth edges without rough spots, proper weight and well balance to hold comfortably. The classic shape design makes it look more beautiful and elegant and can be applied to various furniture styles to match any tableware.

✅【Colour Exterior】This classic golden silverware appearance stands out from ordinary silverware, look more elegant and vintage, smooth surface and fine workmanship make it more luxurious atmosphere. Thanks to the premium stainless steel material, simply give them a quick rinse after using and dry it, the shiny eating utensils set could always look like new with your good care.

✅【Excellent Service】Recommend hand wash first,drying it before storage.To keep silverware shiny,wire brushes, hard sponges or other hard materials that damages silverware are not recommended.If you have any questions about our products, Please feel free to contact us, We will try our best to give you a satisfactory answer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CACOLES 60 Pieces Matte Gold Silverware Set Made of premium 18/0 stainless steelRust-proof & sturdy enough for a long time serviceProper weight & well balance to hold it comfortabeHighly polished & smooth edges with without rough spotsModern design matches well with any style tableware setEasy clean by hand & dishwasher safe to save time

WONDERFUL GIFT This set includes everything you need for a formal full course meal. Elegant and modern gold utensils set perfect for everyday use, dinner party, entertaining, restaurant, hotel, also as a great gift for your family or friends.

Made of 18/0 stainless steel with a finely polished chrome finish, BPA free, no metal aftertaste. Highly polished and smooth edges without rough spots, thickness and weight to hold comfortably. Simple and neat design, standing out from ordinary silverware, look more elegant and vintage.

Smooth Surface This is a metal layer from vacuum plating technology, don't need to worry about fading or cracking. Made of premium stainless steel which is resistant to rust and corrosion, this golden silverware set has a quality feel and can stand the test of time. FINE WORKMANSHIP Simple & Neat Design, Make Your Dining Table Stand 0ut. Using Instruction: 1.Please wash the silverware set with warm soapy water before first use to make sure no manufacturing residue. 2.Please clean the silverware set after using and dry it for their durability. 3.To keep silverware shiny, wire brushes or other hard materials are not recommended, it damages silverware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this set! We've used this for a couple of weeks and it has held up well. Seems to do great in the dishwasher, and it is so pretty! Great set, especially for the price. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I did a lot of research before I chose this gold cutlery set a few factors in deciding where, of course budget first, this was a great price and then I loved that it was satin finish and not shiny. When they arrived, they were well packed and I was happy to see how elegant they are! I am also happy to see that they aren’t super sharp or have raspy barbs of metal as some cutlery sets have sharp edges on spoons and fork tines. The only thing that is sharp Are these nice little butter knives that could help cut your food at dinner, I found sometimes I don’t reach for a Steaknife because these do the job.The only downside is when I go to wash them because of the thin, elegant ends of the handles. They slip through my dishwasher basket down a little too low so that I can’t slide my dishwasher drawer in this is solved by placing them in the utensil basket upside down. Problem solved and I am happy!Only time will tell on how long the gold finish lasts. I’m not going easy on them because I need to live my life, so will update that in the future!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A unique experience with the touch of class
reviews.reviewText: The silverware is amazing beautiful shade of gold and the quality is perfect. It will make any dining experience a unique one dishwasher safety as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful set very fancy worth the money ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So beautiful! I hope the color last long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They are beautiful! Although with the gold you can see the scratches much easier, something I did not think of before ordering. So if you have children or are planning to use these full time beware that you will start to see the scratches from use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Been using for a few week, dish washer safe and very sleek looking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my set
reviews.reviewText: What the nice set! Got so many compliments from my family and guests! I was careful at the beginning to put in dishwasher, but no so far so good. No scratches, no stain. Love it
